name: 4Tacos
description:
A cowardly goose against the whole dinosaur power mafia.

In a distant country called Tacotitlan, there exists the Divine Taco that is distributed among the people for their welfare. Everything was going well until the dinosaurs and their henchmen arrived, who moved by ambition, with deceit, took over the power of the Divine Taco creating many problems for the common people, who, fed up with the situation, with their singing, overthrew the dinosaurs from their throne and in their place placed a wise old man named Señor PG, who returned the benefits of the Divine Taco to the people of Tacotitlan.

But the dinosaurs would not stay with their arms crossed, they would attack with all their wiles to get the Divine Taco again. For this, Mr. PG opts to ask for help from the Legendary Heroes: Tlacuache and Ajolote, but upon arriving at his temple, Mr. PG finds it destroyed and inside there is only Cleto, a cowardly goose who had gone to leave a gift for his friends the Legendary Heroes. Cleto, lamenting for them, imagined the terrible things that Tlacuache and Ajolote would be going through, so leaving his cowardice for a moment he decides to join Lord PG to protect the Divine Taco and go to rescue his friends.

The battle begins in this video game based on the beat em up of the 90s.

  • Fight your way through the streets of Tacotitlan and learn about its folklore.
  • Use special powers against enemies.
  • Learn about the food in each zone of Tacotitlan.
  • Discover the secrets of its sacred millenary lands.
  • Defeat ruthless bosses.
  • Rescue your friends and prevent the dinosaurs from taking over the Taco Divino.
.
Languages: English and Spanish.
